page.title: 01BOGNOR REGIS -ROSE GREEN
page.content: Rose Green is situated to the west of Bognor Regis and forms part of the Chichester plateau.Ten twelfths of the area is farm land.The other two twelfths is mainly residential.The farm land is used for growing crops such as wheat and oil seed rape.There is some animal farming but not much.Some of the land is used by nurseries with large glass houses where plants,fruit,trees,bushes and vegetables are grown.Housing is varied with many bungalows occupied by people who have retired to the seaside.The area has one of the highest sunshine records in the British Isles and many people come to the various caravan sites to spend their annual holidays.
